how would you describe your main use cas: Note-taking;As a knowledge base (including technical, non-fiction and encyclopaedic content);Worldbuilding (e.g. for role-playing games);Programming
do you share your tiddlywiki(s) with oth: Yes, and I am the only editor/administrator of my wiki(s)
putting it all together, what value does:
I use TiddlyWiki to organize for knowledge collection and sharing, but not on a day to day basis.

Having said that, I do find TiddlyWiki very valuable in how to think about, and organize various topics under a certain subject.
what is your level of ability with tiddl: I have customised TiddlyWiki through options and plugins;I am comfortable using WikiText widgets (e.g. <$transclude>, <$list>...);I am comfortable writing filter expressions;I have written custom HTML
how do you save changes in tiddlywiki?: Single-file wiki with custom saver (e.g. TiddlyPWA, Timimi, tw5-browser-nativesaver)
outside of plugins, palettes and other i: I create own macros, functions and procedures. Or at least I try to
what are we doing well? prompts for thin: The TiddlyWiki base is very robust with a plethora of plugins.
what could we do better? prompts for thi: Learning the intricated details of TiddlyWiki is sometimes challenging. There are excellent resources out there, that are findable as wel and TiddlyWiki is amendable to introspection. But more and different perspectives on how TiddlyWiki works would be amazing
with your consent, we would like to publ: Yes, I am happy for my responses to be published
